mapper.select:
SELECT ordtl.ordtl_cd "주문코드" , TO_CHAR(ord.req_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') "주문일자", TO_CHAR(ord.res_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') "납기일자", ordtl.prod_cd "완제품코드" , ordtl.ord_qty "주문수량", vdr.vdr_nm "업체명", pd.prod_nm "완제품명", cd.cd_explan "진행상황"
FROM ORDERS ord, VENDOR vdr, ORD_DTL ordtl, PROD pd, COMM_CODE cd WHERE ord.vdr_cd = vdr.vdr_cd AND ord.ord_cd = ordtl.ord_cd AND ordtl.prod_cd = pd.prod_cd AND cd.comm_cd = ord.prog_cd

SELECT ordtl.ordtl_cd "주문코드" , TO_CHAR(ord.req_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') "주문일자", TO_CHAR(ord.res_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') "납기일자", ordtl.prod_cd "완제품코드" , ordtl.ord_qty "주문수량", vdr.vdr_nm "업체명", pd.prod_nm "완제품명", cd.cd_explan "진행상황" FROM ORDERS ord, VENDOR vdr, ORD_DTL ordtl, PROD pd, COMM_CODE cd WHERE ord.vdr_cd = vdr.vdr_cd AND ord.ord_cd = ordtl.ord_cd AND ordtl.prod_cd = pd.prod_cd AND cd.comm_cd = ord.prog_cd AND ordtl.ordtl_cd = #{ordCd}
SELECT PROD_CD "완제품코드", PROD_NM "완제품명" FROM PROD WHERE PROD_CD = #{prodCd}

SELECT pl.pp_cd "생산계획코드", pl.pp_nm "계획명", dtl.pd_cd "생산계획상세코드", pd.prod_nm "완제품명", TO_CHAR(pl.pp_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') "계획일자", dtl.pd_qty "계획량" FROM PRDT_PL pl, PLAN_DTL dtl, PROD pd WHERE pl.pp_cd = dtl.pp_cd AND dtl.prod_cd = pd.prod_cd

SELECT pl.pp_cd "생산계획코드", pl.pp_nm "계획명", TO_CHAR(pl.pp_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') "계획일자", dtl.pd_qty "계획량" FROM PRDT_PL pl, PLAN_DTL dtl WHERE pl.pp_cd = dtl.pp_cd
AND pl.pp_dt BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{date1},'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(#{date2},'YY/MM/DD')

SELECT dtl.pp_cd "생산계획코드", pl.pp_nm "계획명", pd.prod_nm "완제품명", pd.prod_cd "완제품코드", pl.ord_cd "주문코드", dtl.pd_qty "계획량", dtl.pd_dt "생산일수", dtl.pd_rank "작업우선순위" FROM PRDT_PL pl, PLAN_DTL dtl, PROD pd,ORDERS ord WHERE pl.pp_cd = dtl.pp_cd AND pl.ord_cd = ord.ord_cd AND dtl.prod_cd = pd.prod_cd AND dtl.pp_cd = #{ppCd}

SELECT dtl.pp_cd "생산계획코드", pl.pp_nm "계획명", dtl.pd_cd "생산계획상세코드", pd.prod_nm "완제품명", pd.prod_cd "완제품코드", dtl.pd_qty "계획량", dtl.pd_rank "작업우선순위", dtl.pd_dt "생산일수", pl.pp_prog "상태"
FROM PRDT_PL pl, PLAN_DTL dtl, PROD pd,ORDERS ord WHERE pl.pp_cd = dtl.pp_cd AND pl.ord_cd = ord.ord_cd AND dtl.prod_cd = pd.prod_cd
AND pl.pp_prog = 'PLAN01'
AND pl.pp_prog = 'PLAN02'
AND pl.pp_prog = 'PLAN03'
AND pd.prod_nm = #{prdNm}
AND pl.pp_dt BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{date1},'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(#{date2},'YY/MM/DD')

SELECT dtl.pp_cd "생산계획코드", pl.pp_nm "계획명", dtl.pd_cd "생산계획상세코드", pd.prod_nm "완제품명", pd.prod_cd "완제품코드", dtl.pd_qty "계획량", dtl.pd_rank "작업우선순위", dtl.pd_dt "생산일수", ins.ins_st "상태"
FROM PRDT_PL pl, PLAN_DTL dtl, PROD pd, PRD_INS ins WHERE pl.pp_cd = dtl.pp_cd AND dtl.prod_cd = pd.prod_cd AND ins.pd_cd = dtl.pd_cd AND ins.pp_cd = dtl.pp_cd AND ins.ins_st = 'PRDT01'

SELECT dtl.pp_cd "생산계획코드", pl.pp_nm "계획명", dtl.pd_cd "생산계획상세코드", pd.prod_nm "완제품명", pd.prod_cd "완제품코드", dtl.pd_qty "계획량", dtl.pd_rank "작업우선순위", dtl.pd_dt "생산일수"
FROM PRDT_PL pl, PLAN_DTL dtl, PROD pd,ORDERS ord WHERE pl.pp_cd = dtl.pp_cd AND pl.ord_cd = ord.ord_cd AND dtl.prod_cd = pd.prod_cd AND dtl.pd_cd = #{ppCd}
SELECT li.line_cd "라인코드" FROM LINE li, PROD pd WHERE li.prod_cd = pd.prod_cd AND pd.prod_nm = #{prodNm}

SELECT P.PROD_CD "제품코드", B.MT_CD "자재코드", M.MT_NM "자재명", B.CS_QTY "소모량", DTL.PRD_DTLCD "생산지시상세코드" FROM BOM B, MT M, PROD P, LINE LI, PRD_INSDTL DTL WHERE B.MT_CD = M.MT_CD AND B.PROD_CD = P.PROD_CD AND P.PROD_CD = DTL.PROD_CD AND LI.PROD_CD = P.PROD_CD AND LI.LINE_CD = #{line}

SELECT DTL.PRD_DTLCD "지시디테일코드", LOT.MT_LOT "자재LOT번호", QTY.MT_QTY "현재고", M.MT_NM "자재명", B.MT_CD "자재코드", TO_CHAR(LOT.MT_EXP, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "유통기한" FROM PRD_INSDTL DTL, PROD P, BOM B, MT_LOT LOT, MT_CURQTY QTY, MT M WHERE DTL.PROD_CD = P.PROD_CD AND P.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD AND B.MT_CD = M.MT_CD AND M.MT_CD = LOT.MT_CD AND LOT.MT_LOT = QTY.MT_LOT AND M.MT_CD = #{mtNm} AND DTL.PRD_DTLCD = #{dtlCd}
